title: Psalms 67:1
text: GOD be merciful unto us, and bless us; and cause his face to shine upon us; Selah.

title: Psalms 67:2
text: That thy way may be known upon earth, thy saving health among all nations.

title: Psalms 67:3
text: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.

title: Psalms 67:4
text: O let the nations be glad and sing for joy: for thou shalt judge the people righteously, and govern the nations upon earth.  Selah.

title: Psalms 67:5
text: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.

title: Psalms 67:6
text: Then shall the earth yield her increase; and God, even our own God, shall bless us.

title: Psalms 67:7
text: God shall bless us; and all the ends of the earth shall fear him.
